meanings.definition: Cause to lose balance or stability.
meanings.sent1: The strong wind misbalancing the tree branches.
meanings.sent2: She misbalanced the stack of books by bumping into the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The misbalancing act of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His sudden confession misbalanced her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake misbalancing the entire city was terrifying.

meanings.sent1: The shaky table misbalancing the vase.
meanings.sent2: The boat rocked, misbalancing the passengers.
meanings.sent3: The misbalancing dance moves of the toddler were adorable.
meanings.sent4: His unexpected question misbalanced her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The misbalancing effect of the medicine was concerning.
